results.title: Insulin and Metformin are Associated With Reduced Risk of Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis.
results.text_hl: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ are Associated With Reduced Risk of @<m>DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Lehrer S, Rheinstein PH. Insulin and Metformin are Associated With Reduced Risk of Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis. Chronic Dis Transl Med. 2025 Jun;11(2):148-155. PMID: 40486953

results.title: Activation of autophagy attenuates motor deficits and extends lifespan in a C. elegans model of ALS.
results.text_hl: Our findings suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could be further explored as a potential therapeutic agent in treating @<m>DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@ALS@@@.

citations.NLM: Xu H, Jia C, Cheng C, Wu H, Cai H, Le W. Activation of autophagy attenuates motor deficits and extends lifespan in a C. elegans model of ALS. Free Radic Biol Med. 2022 Mar;181():52-61. PMID: 35114355

results.title: Metformin ameliorates mitochondrial damage induced by C9orf72 poly(GR) via upregulating AKT phosphorylation.
results.text_hl: Taken together, our results indicated restoring mitochondrial function with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be a rational therapeutic strategy to reduce poly(GR) @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ in @GENE_C9ORF72 @GENE_203228 @@@C9orf72@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@ALS@@@/@DISEASE_Frontotemporal_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D057180 @@@FTD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Feng Y, Xu Z, Jin H, Chen Y, Fu C, Zhang Y, Yin Y, Wang H, Cheng W. Metformin ameliorates mitochondrial damage induced by C9orf72 poly(GR) via upregulating AKT phosphorylation. J Cell Biochem. 2024 Jan 17;():. PMID: 38229533

results.title: Medications on hypertension, hyperlipidemia, diabetes, and risk of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (OR: 0.83, 95%CI: 0.75, 0.93) and @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@ (OR: 0.79, 95%CI:0.71, 0.89) use could significantly reduce the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@ALS@@@.

citations.NLM: Hu N, Ji H. Medications on hypertension, hyperlipidemia, diabetes, and risk of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Neurol Sci. 2022 Sep;43(9):5189-5199. PMID: 35616813
citations.BibTeX: @article{35616813, title={Medications on hypertension, hyperlipidemia, diabetes, and risk of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis: a systematic review and meta-analysis.}, author={Hu N and Ji H}, journal={Neurol Sci}, volume={43}, number={9}, pages={5189-5199}}

results.title: Repurposed Edaravone, Metformin, and Perampanel as a Potential Treatment for Hypoxia-Ischemia Encephalopathy: An In Vitro Study
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Edaravone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077553 @@@Edaravone@@@, @CHEMICAL_perampanel @CHEMICAL_MESH:C551441 @@@perampanel@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are used for the treatment of @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@amyotrophic lateral sclerosis@@@, some forms of @DISEASE_Epilepsy @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@epileptic@@@ status, and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@diabetes type 2@@@, respectively.

citations.NLM: Silva D, Rocha R, Correia AS, Mota B, Madeira MD, Vale N, Cardoso A. Repurposed Edaravone, Metformin, and Perampanel as a Potential Treatment for Hypoxia-Ischemia Encephalopathy: An In Vitro Study Biomedicines. 2022 Nov 25;10(12):. PMID: 36551799

results.title: Compounds that extend longevity are protective in neurodegenerative diseases and provide a novel treatment strategy for these devastating disorders.
results.text_hl: In this review, we examine the effects of five compounds that have been shown to extend longevity (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Acetylcysteine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000111 @@@N-acetyl-l-cysteine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Curcumin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003474 @@@curcumin@@@) in four of the most common @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ (@DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Huntington_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@amyotrophic lateral sclerosis@@@).

citations.NLM: Soo SK, Rudich PD, Traa A, Harris-Gauthier N, Shields HJ, Van Raamsdonk JM. Compounds that extend longevity are protective in neurodegenerative diseases and provide a novel treatment strategy for these devastating disorders. Mech Ageing Dev. 2020 Sep;190():111297. PMID: 32610099
citations.BibTeX: @article{32610099, title={Compounds that extend longevity are protective in neurodegenerative diseases and provide a novel treatment strategy for these devastating disorders.}, author={Soo SK and Rudich PD and Traa A and Harris-Gauthier N and Shields HJ and Van Raamsdonk JM}, journal={Mech Ageing Dev}, volume={190}, pages={111297}}
